kv5.10:3.3: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattīti?
kv5.10:4.3: Sāvako jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv5.10:5.3: Sāvako anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
kv5.10:6.6: tena hi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṁ atthīti …pe….
kv5.10:7.1: Vimuttiñāṇaṁ vimuttaṁ, sekhassa asekhaṁ ñāṇaṁ, viparīte ñāṇaṁ, aniyatassa niyāmagamanāya atthi ñāṇaṁ, sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭisambhidāti, sammutiñāṇaṁ, cetopariyāye ñāṇaṁ, anāgate ñāṇaṁ, paṭuppanne ñāṇaṁ, sāvakassa phale ñāṇanti.
kv5.10:8.1: Sattupaladdhiṁ, upaharato, balaṁ, gihi’ssa arahā ca, vimuttipañcamanti.
